summary: My career in IT got started as a Manul QA Tester then moved-on to become Automation Engineer and finally Software Developer.
With more than 10 years of experience, I had the opportunity to work in Waterfall, Agile and Squad development models.
Past 3 years, I have been developing full stack features on brand Expedia website.
After Vrbo acquisation by Expedia, my team played a critical role in integrating Vrbo properties in Expedia's system.
Currently, I work on Rest/GraphQL Microservices in the back-end and React PWA in the front-end
